#include<cstdio>
int main()
{
     int tcase;
     scanf("%d",&tcase);
     while(tcase--)
     {
          int n,x,y,z;
          scanf("%d",&n);
          scanf("%d%d%d",&x,&y,&z);
          int price,flag=0;
          int temp=1000*x+100*y+10*z;
          int i,j;
          for(i=9;i>0;i--)
          {
               for(j=9;j>=0;j--)
               {
                   price=10000*i+temp+j;
                   if(!(price%n))
                   {
                        flag=1;
                        break;
                   }
               }
               if(flag)
                    break;
          }
          if(flag)
               printf("%d %d %d\n",i,j,(price/n));
          else
               printf("0\n");
     }
}
